amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the expenditure of any funds appropriated in the bill for refugee assistance to be used for general operating expenses at the State Department.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 4 in House Rept. 104-167, to prohibit the expenditure of any funds appropriated in the bill for refugee assistance to be used for Population, Refugees, and Migration Bureau operating expenses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A042) Agreed to by voice vote.
